text: وَقَالُواْ ٱتَّخَذَ ٱللَّهُ وَلَدٗاۗ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥۖ بَل لَّهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ كُلّٞ لَّهُۥ قَٰنِتُونَ

translation.en: They say, "Allah has taken a son." Exalted is He! Rather, to Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and the earth. All are devoutly obedient to Him
translation.id: Dan mereka berkata, "Allah mempunyai anak." Mahasuci Allah, bahkan milik-Nyalah apa yang di langit dan di bumi. Semua tunduk kepada-Nya
